helpsetting.title: Check Your Internet Connection
helpsetting.description: Ensure you have a stable internet connection. Try loading a webpage or another app to verify connectivity.
helpsetting.descriptionone: Close the app completely and reopen it. Then, try to play the movie again.
helpsetting.descriptiontwo: Make sure you’re using the latest version of the app. Check for updates in your device’s app store.
helpsetting.descriptionthree: If your device supports it, clearing the app cache can help resolve playback issues. Go to settings, find the app, and clear the cache.
helpsetting.descriptionfour: Sometimes a simple restart can fix playback issues. Turn your device off and back on.
helpsetting.descriptionfive: If possible, try playing on another device to check if the issue is device-specific.
helpsetting.descriptionsix: Occasionally server issues can affect playback. Check our status page or social media for outage updates.
helpsetting.descriptionseven: If you’ve tried all steps and it still won’t play, contact support with your device details and the title you're trying to watch.

privacy.privateAccountDesc: When your account is private, your approved profile and activities cannot be seen by everyone.
privacy.requireGroupApprovalDesc: If enabled, people must send an invite before adding you to Watch+ groups.
privacy.optOutDataSharing: Opt Out of Third-Party Data Sharing
privacy.optOutDataSharingDesc: We may share anonymized data for analytics and ads to improve ReelRecs. Opting out keeps your data private and won't affect your app experience.
